name: Sociallist
author: Codemaster

sections.description:
SocialList.org spreads your content across the Internet by making it easier for your website visitors to share it with other people. Social bookmarking sites are a popular way to store, classify, share and search links. In a social bookmarking system, users store lists of Internet resources, which they find useful. These lists are both accessible to the public or a specific network, and other people with similar interests can view the links by category, tags, or even randomly. Our simple yet powerful widget and plugins are very easy to install. SocialList Bookmarking Widget is the best tool to help your website visitors create a buzz for your site and increase its ranking and popularity.

Upgrade

  1. First deactivate Sociallist
  2. Remove the sociallist-social-bookmarking-widget directory
  3. Unzip the sociallist-social-bookmarking-widget...zip file.
  4. Upload the the sociallist-social-bookmarking-widget folder (not just the files in it!) in your
    wp-contents/plugins folder. If you’re using FTP, use ‘binary’ mode.
  5. In your WordPress administration, go to the Plugins page
  6. Activate the Sociallist plugin and a subpage for Sociallist will appear
    in your Options menu.
sections.installation:
1. Unzip the sociallist-social-bookmarking-widget...zip file.
  2. Upload the the sociallist-social-bookmarking-widget folder (not just the files in it!) in your
    wp-contents/plugins folder. If you’re using FTP, use ‘binary’ mode.
  3. In your WordPress administration, go to the Plugins page
  4. Activate the Sociallist plugin and a subpage for Sociallist will appear
    in your Options menu.
sections.faq:
Is SocialList service free ?

SocialList.org is absolutely free. The features on SocialList.org will always be free.

short_description: Allow websurfers to save and share interesting pages. The plugin appends widget for popular social bookmarking sites to the end of blog’s posts.

screenshots.caption: This is the SocialList Bookmark button.
The drop-down menu appears instantly when visitors move the mouse over the SocialList button.
The drop-down menu with customized language and size.
